author: andschwa
body: Follow up with Jan   It appears that the way CoreCLR handles P Invokes has improved, as we no longer seem to need NoInlining attributes on everything.  Update  switching from Mono to Roslyn is what enabled this.  VSO create date - 9/15/2015 10:00:00     VSO closed date - 9/17/2015 16:19:00
title: Remove NoInlining attributes if possible
